### Welcome on my GitHub profile
I'm student at Faculty of Information technology VUT Brno.
My interests head to Android apps development, device communication, data encryption and UI/UX design. I'm also developing apps for microcontrollers and Raspberry Pi.


#### My projects
- [Electric longboard](https://github.com/GargiMan/GlBoard) controlled by [Android application](https://github.com/GargiMan/GlApp)
- [Project testing shell script](https://github.com/GargiMan/test-script)
- School projects
